author: Will Knight
title: This Home Robot Clears Tables and Loads the Dishwasher All by Itself - WIRED
description: Sunday Robotics has a new way to train robots to do common household tasks. The startup plans to put its fully autonomous robots in homes next year.
content:
Memo may not be the worlds fastest barista, but it is impressivefor a robot.
I recently watched as Memo, a new home robot from a company called Sunday Robotics, made coffee in an open-plan kitchen iâ€¦ [+1496 chars]
